#Text=Islam Khan V
#Text=Islam Khan V
#Text=( died 21 Safar
#Text=1147 AH/1734 AD ) was one of the prominent Emir and nobleman during the Mughal empire .

#Text=He was titled " Islam Khan " and " Barkhurdar Khan " by Emperor Bahadur Shah I and held many important posts during the successive rules of Bahadur Shah I , Jahandar Shah , Farrukhsiyar , Rafi ud Darajat , Shah Jahan II and Muhammad Shah .
#Text=Biography
#Text=Barkhurdar Khan II aka Mian Kheesa was the son of Barkhurdar Khan I and great-grandson of Islam Khan I .

#Text=Barkhurdar Khan II was Mansabdar Punj Hazari ( 5,000 ) and also entitled " Islam Khan " by Shah Alam I and had Mansab " Darogha Dīwān-e-Khās " ( Superintendent of the Diwan-i-Khas ) and Khalat -e Fakhra and Khalat -e Barani .

#Text=He was " Mir Atash " ( the master gunner ) to Bahadur Shah I before his retirement from court , but was restored to his rank of 5,000 ( 3,000 horse ) , and appointed Mir Tuzak Awwal ( chief Mir Tuzak / quarter-master general ) .

#Text=This " Islam Khan " ( d. 1144 AH/1731 – 1732 ) was one Mir Ahmad , first " Barkhurdar Khan " , then " Islam Khan " , son of Safi Khan ( d. 1105 AH/1693 – 1694 ) , the second son of Abdus-salam , first " Ikhtisas Khan " , then " Islam Khan " , Mashhadi , ( d. 1057 AH/1647 – 1648 ) . [ 1 ]
#Text=This Islam Khan played a crucial role in negotiating a settlement during the crises of the ( clash of the nobles ) with the Sayyid Brothers .
#Text=Awards and honours
#Text=Shah Alam I

#Text=alias Bahadur Shah I in his first Juloos ( royal procession / parade ) on early days of Rabi ' al-thani awarded the title Islam Khan , Mansab " Darogha Dīwān-e-Khās " ( Superintendent of the Diwan-i-Khas ) along with Khalat -e Fakhra , Naqqara and " Ilm " [ 2 ] :18

column1: #Text=Shah Alam I
#Text=in his second Juloos on 9 Dhu al-Qi'dah appointed him " Darogha Topkhana " , a store of Armory ( military ) [ 2 ] :40
#Text=Shah Alam I
#Text=in his third Juloos on 15 Jumada al-awwal awarded him Khalat -e Barani [ 2 ] :60
#Text=In the third Juloos of Shah Alam I on 13 Shawwal , prince awarded him Khalat [ 2 ] :80
#Text=Islam Khan was appointed as ' Mir Atash ' ( the master gunner ) to Shah Alam I [ 2 ] :87
#Text=Shah Alam I
#Text=in his fourth Juloos on 8 Jumada al-Thani awarded Khalat in praise of " Mir Atash " [ 2 ] :98
#Text=‘ Islam Khan Bahadur Mir Atash ’ was included in the front-runner battalion in a war during fourth Juloos on 19 Shawwal of Shah Alam I [ 2 ] :109
#Text=Shah Alam I
#Text=in his fourth Juloos on 22 Shawwal awarded Khalat -e Chaar Parcha [ 2 ] :113
#Text=Shah Alam I
#Text=in his fifth Juloos on 19 Rajab 1123 AH ( 1711 ) appointed Islam Khan as " Mir Tuzak Awwal " ( chief Mir Tuzak / quarter-master general ) along with Khalat -e Fakhra [ 2 ] :129
#Text=Shah Alam I
#Text=in his fifth Juloos 1711 awarded Islam Khan Mir Atash with Mansabdar Punj Hazari ( 5,000 ) and 2000 + 500 Sawar [ 2 ] :131

#Text=On Friday 15 Dhu al-Hijjah , in the second Juloos of Emperor Farrukhsiyar , " Islam Khan " and his close relative Khan Zaman Khan Ali Asghar attended the Friday prayer along with Emperor Farrukhsiyar [ 2 ] :171
#Text=On 20 Muharram in the second Juloos of Muhammad Shah , he got the opportunity to meet and discuss the king at Masjid Moth [ 2 ] :326
#Text=Islam Khan V ( Barkhurdar Khan II ) along with his close relative Khan Zaman Khan Ali Asghar were invited to attend the marriage ceremony of the prince of Shah Alam I [ 2 ] :92
#Text=In some last dates of Muharram in the 6 Juloos , he was appointed as " Bakshigiri Tan " ( Salary officer ) in place of Aitamuddaula .

#Text=He was also awarded with Khalat -e Khas and one ornate " Qabza-i dhup " ( canopy ) . [ 2 ] :175 However , on 12th Shaban 1125 AH , 2 September 1713 , Ghazi-uddin Khan ( Ahmad Beg ) obtained charge of the retinue ( jalau ) , vice Islam Khan , who had held it in addition to his principal office of Mir Tuzak . [ 1 ]
#Text=Death
#Text=Hakim Syed Zillur Rahman

#Text=in his book Hayat Karam Husain quoted his date of death as 21 Safar 1147 AH/1734 with reference to Tarikh-i Mohammadi [ 3 ] while other authors mentioned his death date as 1144 AH/1731 – 32 . [ 1 ]
#Text=Family history
#Text=The family of Barkhurdar Khan belonged to Salim Chishti .
#Text=Islam Khan I
#Text=was his forefather .
#Text=This family maintained the tradition of receiving the title " Islam Khan " from the Mughal emperors .
#Text=One of the daughters of Qazi Syed Rafi Mohammad was married to Qazi Ghulam Mustafa , and another daughter Sahib Daulat was married to Barkhurdar Khan II .
#Text=Because of these relationshipps , Islam Khan V was close to Khan Zaman Khan Ali Asghar .
#Text=Both achieved important posts in the court of Mughal kings .
#Text=Marriage and children

#Text=Barkhurdar II married Sahib Daulat , the daughter of Qazi Syed Rafi Mohammad and had two sons – elder son Ghulam Baqi aka Maddan was also entitled ‘ Barkhurdar Khan ’ ( Barkhurdar III ) , while his younger son Ghulam Mohammad aka Saddan was killed ( martyred ) during the fight between the English forces and Shuja-ud-Daula in 1765 .
#Text=Ghulam Baqi was married to his cousin ( daughter of Mah Bibi bint Qazi Syed Rafi Mohammad and Noorul Haq ibn Mian Abdur Rahman of Tijara )
